category.name: SkinCareSets

product.name: Intensity Glow Set
product.description: Will make your complexion fairer, rosier, and will make your skin glow. Soap – to gently exfoliate and whiten your skin, and it also has an anti-wrinkle effect, Toner – to whiten your skin, reduce pores, and to smoothen wrinkle lines, Day Cream – makes your complexion more even and radiant, Sun-block – protects your skin from the sun’s harmful rays, Night Cream – smoothens and refreshes your skin.

product.name: IGP Beauty Glow Set
product.description: Soap – to gently exfoliate and whiten your skin, and it also has an anti-wrinkle effect, Lotion – A very good cleanser, Toner – to minimize pore size for moderate peel and whitening, Sunblock – SPF 30 for protection against the sun, Night-Cream – Lightens the skin tone of the face with a mild peeling effect, Placenta-Cream – Moisturizes and whitens the skin.

category.product: IGP Anti Wrinkle Set Reduces wrinkle and rejuvenates your skin. Soap – prevents wrinkle formation, Anti-Wrinkle Toner – Minimize pore size and has a mild peeling and whitening effect, SunBlock with Placenta cream – Moisturizes and protects the skin from sun damage, Anti-Wrinkle Cream – Diminishes wrinkle lines. 799.98

product.name: IGP Acne Control Set
product.description: Reduces unwanted pimples and acne. Soap – dries out pimples and is anti-bacterial, Toner – controls the skins oiliness, ACS – fast acting pimple remover, Sun-block Gel – protects your face from harmful rays of the sun, Night Cream – whitening cream with anti-oxidants.

product.name: IGP Body Bleaching Set
product.description: Gives you a silky, fairer, and younger looking skin. Whitening Soap – Whitens and cleans your skin, Body Scrubber – Exfoliating green papaya scrubber, Whitening Lotion – Whitens and moisturizes your skin, SunBlock Lotion – SPF 30 protection from the sun.
